root.string: Not enough Gold!
Not enough Stone!
Not enough Wood!
Not enough Swordsmen Gear available!

string.Comments: Our Archers need more Arms!KoBo: These "available Bows/Swords/Siege Engine Parts" actually are finished goods, not resources. Also, there are 2 kinds of swords:{cr}1. In Swordsmith buildings (type G_PoorSword, name "Sword").{cr}2. In Swordfighter Barracks (type G_Sword, name "Swordsmen Gear"). {cr}Same applies to G_PoorBow ("Bow") and G_Bow (“Bowmen Gear”).{cr}Currently the names of G_Sword and G_Bow are not directly displayed anywhere in the game and probably will never be, as these can’t be traded.{cr}However, they are mentioned in the Textline messages “Not enough available Swordsmen Gear!” and similar.{cr}Correspondingly, “Swords Armorer” was renamed to “Swordsmen Armorer”, and “Bow Armorer” to “Bowmen Armorer”, in order to clearly differentiate them{cr}(they work in the barracks) from “Swordsmith” and “Bow Maker”.

root.string: Not enough Bowmen Gear available!

Not enough Props to start a Play!
Not enough Gold and Stone!
Not enough Gold and Wood!
Not enough Gold and Bowmen Gear available!
Not enough Gold and Props to start a Play!

string.Comments: shown when trying to place a field, beehive or pasture on barren ground. All of these need fertile ground

root.string: This needs fertile ground!
That Terrain cannot be reached from the Storehouse!

string.Comments: player tries to build in a territory that doesn't belong to him.

root.string: That Territory doesn't belong to us!
That Terrain is too uneven!
That Terrain cannot be reached from the Castle!
That Territory is claimed by another faction!
Our Settlers limit has been reached!
Our Soldiers limit has been reached!
Not enough room here for troops!
Not enough room for a Siege Engine here!
Too far away from a Barracks!

string.Comments: Promoting a knight is only possible when no settlers strike

root.string: Not possible while Settlers are striking!

string.Comments: Promoting a knight is only possible when he is on the marketplace{cr}Note: this text is also used for another case, when the knight has to be on the marketplace to start his special ability (e.g. give out food).

root.string: Knight has to be at the Marketplace!
No space on the Marketplace!
Not enough space in the Storehouse!
This Territory is already ours!
Unreachable!
Not ready yet!
Not enough Gold and available Swordsmen Gear!
Not enough Gold and Siege Engine Parts available!

string.Comments: KoBo: comes when "whisper" mode is chosen in the chat menu, and the player tries to chat, but no whisper target is chosen.

root.string: Select a player to whisper to!

Not enough Gold and Iron!

string.Comments: KoBo: Not specific. Used for the DeliverGoods button for Quests, where any GoodType could be sent.

Target Faction has insufficient space in the Storehouse!

string.Comments: It's not possible to knock down a building the inhabitants of which are striking.

Target Faction has no space on the Marketplace!
